ModMetaData.name: [test] Megafauna + CE compatibility patch (b18)
ModMetaData.author: rwtesting
ModMetaData.description:
Combat Extended compatibility patch for Megafauna (b18).
Makes Megafauna b18 compatible with Combat Extended b18.
Note: Stun attacks from Megafauna animals have temporarily been removed to avoid CE issue https://github.com/NoImageAvailable/CombatExtended/issues/375
Plugged values from MF+CE a17 patch by Kodapa / Bloody Spy! into patch script for b18.
If some entities appear to be too fragile, the health/armor values can be adjusted (leave an issue on github).
Load order: - Combat Extended - Megafauna - CEPatchMegafauna
The MF+CE a17 patch by Kodapa / Bloody Spy! can be found here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1092233785
